channel.title: AIAA on Hassan Saad Ifti
channel.description: Recent content in AIAA on Hassan Saad Ifti

item.title: AIAA SPACE 2018
item.description: AIAA SPACE 2018, ORLANDO, FL, USA OTI’s Hassan Saad Ifti presented his paper on “flow characterisation of porous UHTCs (Ultra-High-Temperature-Ceramics) for transpiration cooling of hypersonic vehicles” at the ’22nd AIAA International Space Planes and Hypersonic Systems and Technologies Conference’ within the AIAA SPACE Forum 2018. Read more…
